name: fibreglass
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a strong, light material made by twisting together small threads of glass and plastic, used especially for structures such as cars and boats: a fibreglass hull/speedboat

a strong light material made by twisting together small threads of glass and plastic, used especially for making structures such as cars and boats: The hull of the ship is made of fibreglass-reinforced plastic.
